=Our Blog: The Main Events in the Life of Ajax Portal Project=


<img src="http://ajaxportal.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/russian.gif"> *RUSSIAN Version:* [http://code.google.com/p/ajaxportal/wiki/blog_ru]

*_If you want to receive news about Ajax Portal you have to add yourself in our Google group [http://groups.google.com/group/ajaxportal]. As result you will receive month reports about our achievements, new releases and new available documentation._*

*The start of February, 2010* - The page about Ajax Portal was created on free hosting provider [http://sokolovbook.narod.ru/en/ajaxportal.html NAROD.RU].

*February 19, 2010* - Account on SourceForge is created. The project *ajaxportal* on SourceForge was already in used, but there weren't any changes about 3 years.

*March 24, 2010* - The assumption mechanism for *ajaxportal* account on SourceForge, because it was not used any changes about 3 years.

*April 26, 2010* - We had the complete implementation of Ajax Submit and Content Aggregation patterns. We had the base for the new software product.

*May 25, 2010* - We were the owner of the *ajaxportal* account on SourceForge.

*May 26, 2010* - We were the owner of the *ajaxportal* account on Code.GOOGLE (the same situation with unused account).

*June, 2010* - We had the concept of the three main modules (*Decoration*, *Personalization* and *HttpProxy/HttpRepeater*) of Ajax Portal, which are the base of the first version.

*July 28, 2010* - The beta of Ajax Portal 1.0.0 transformed to *the version 1.0.1 (Alpha #1)*. The reason is too many conceptual changes. It's not version 1.1, because the main features of the version 1.1 is not implemented.

*August 27, 2010* - We had a new developer from Indonesia.

*September 17..19, 2010* - We participated in HackDay #7 in Moscow. The dictionaries for Ajax Portal security profile was implemented by *SoftLocalization* subproject.

*The end of September, 2010* - We had two main terms: *Ajax Portal* (technology name) and *Enterprise Ajax Portal* (product name).

*The start of October, 2010* - We added *Security* module as a new component of Ajax Portal.

*October 22, 2010* - We registered for Web-Ready 2010 in St. Petersburg.

*October 23..24, 2010* - We participated in HackDay #9 in St. Petersburg. We had two projects: 1) *StartUpSecurity* (profile of the user which is based on JSF 1.2) 2) *Ajax Portal*.

*November 15, 2010* - We fixed the main issue in Ajax Portal with Internet Explorer. We found workaround. See *Alpha #2 of Enterprise Ajax Portal*.

*December 29, 2010* - Ajax Portal was announced on start-up school in Minsk. One business angel was interested in our project. The goal of the contact is not an investment, but it's the product selling to Belarusian enterprises and banks.

*January 5, 2011* - Ajax Portal 1.0.2 (Alpha #3) was released. Support of IFRAME was implemented. The static client part of Ajax Portal was stabilized.

*February 28,  2011* - We buy two domains: *ajaxportal.org* and *ajaxportal.ru*.

*March 2, 2011* - New version of Enterprise Ajax Portal *Decoration module* released (see [http://ajaxportal.googlecode.com/files/ajaxportal_decoration_static-1.0.3.zip ajaxportal_decoration_static-1.0.3.zip]).

*March 17, 2011* - We have an agreement about investment consulting with Business Accelerator (Minsk, Belarus).

*April 12, 2011* - We release ajax4all library ver. 1.0.3 ([http://ajaxportal.googlecode.com/files/ajax4all-1.0.3_beta.zip download]). The library has *beta* status. There're no critical issues. We know about 2 specific issues in Opera 10/11.

*April 18, 2011* - We activate the bug tracking for version 1.0.4 of Ajax Portal. [http://code.google.com/p/ajaxportal/issues/list See details...].

*April 25, 2011* - We release <b>Decoration module (JSP tag library)</b> ver. 1.0.3 (Alpha4) for Ajax Portal. See [http://code.google.com/p/ajaxportal/downloads/list download list].

*May 20, 2011* - We activate our first domain. See [http://ajaxportal.org].

*June 16, 2011* - Ajax Portal ASP.NET 1.0.3 controls project has been added. Now <b>Ajax Portal</b> is cross-platform solution.

*September 29, 2011* - We take part in Web-Ready 2011. Please, see our project - application #436 [http://www.web-ready.ru/konkurs/podannye_zayavki_2011/the_best_project1/ajax_portal/].

*October 10, 2011* - We take part in IT Jump 2011.

*November 29, 2011* - *Static Version of Ajax Portal* 1.0.4 is released and comes in Beta version. Please see [http://ajaxportal.googlecode.com/files/ajaxportal_decoration_static-1.0.4.zip]. Now we prepare to publish customization module for Ajax Portal and Repository of Portlets. These components are based on the current static version. 


*_If you want to receive news about Ajax Portal you have to add yourself in our Google group [http://groups.google.com/group/ajaxportal]. As result you will receive month reports about our achievements, new releases and new available documentation._*
